main event: Japanese military personnel observed a brilliant white object for 8 seconds at Mitio AB, Japan, on 9 August 1954.
interesting points: The object was described as moving laterally at 14,000 feet before disappearing behind a cloud layer., A conclusion of the report indicated the sighting remains unidentified., The object was reported by personnel of the 2D Infantry Battalion, Japanese Maritime Self-Defense Force., The object showed a metallic appearance and changed direction and speed several times during its observation., A witness described seeing a black shadow on the trailing edge of the visible white light.
